oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A ceremony performed with the Brachycerus (African Ground Weevil) in order to preserve young babies from convulsions. In the Katkop dialect by D !kw in (L V.
5840). The Brachycerus used to cure illness in little children. By /han kass o (L VIII.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Custom observed with Bushman children, when too young to walk
